org.apache.flex.abc.models

Interface FrameModelVisitor<T>


  • public interface FrameModelVisitor<T>
    The FrameModelVisitor interface presents an abstract view of ABC bytecode semantics, focused on maintenance of the AVM "frame" (the local variable slots, the scope stack, and the value stack).

    • Method Detail

      • visit

        void visit(FrameModelEncoder encoder)
        Begin a visit to a method body.
        Parameters:
        encoder - - the FrameModelEncoder driving the visit.

      • visitEnd

        void visitEnd()
        Finish visiting a method body.

      • noFrameEffect

        T noFrameEffect(Instruction i)
        Handle an instruction that does not affect the frame.
        Parameters:
        i - - the Instruction.
        Returns:
        a representation of the Instruction, which may be null if the visitor works by internal side effect.

      • consumeValue

        T consumeValue(Instruction i,
             int count)
        Handle an instruction that consumes value stack elements.
        Parameters:
        i - - the Instruction.
        count - - the number of value stack elements consumed.
        Returns:
        a representation of the Instruction and its operands, which may be null if the visitor works by internal side effect.

      • branch

        T branch(Instruction i,
       IBasicBlock target)
        Handle a branch instruction.
        Parameters:
        i - - the Instruction.
        target - - the Instruction's target. Instructions with fall-through semantics also implicitly target the next Block.
        Returns:
        a representation of the Instruction, which may be null if the visitor works by internal side effect.

        Returns:

      • modifyLocal

        void modifyLocal(Instruction i,
               int idx)
        Modify (i.e., increment, decrement, or kill) a local variable. Note that this does not yield an Instruction, it's a notification.
        Parameters:
        i - - the Instruction.
        idx - - the variable's index.

      • visitBlock

        boolean visitBlock(IBasicBlock b)
        Visit a new Block.
        Parameters:
        b - - the Block.
        Returns:
        true if the stack encoder should continue visiting the Block.

      • visitEndBlock

        void visitEndBlock(IBasicBlock b)
        End a visit to a block.
        Parameters:
        b - - the Block. Must be the block passed to the most recent visitBlock(b) call that returned true.

             IBasicBlock to)
